page.title: 13 THE BELL INN
page.content:
The{Bell Inn}is the only public house in the Ash District.The building dates back to the sixteenth century and it has been a public house for a long time,Mr Woodhouse is the present owner. The Inn is open from 11a.m. until 2p.m. and then again from 7p.m. until 11p.m.It is a freehouse and sells 65 different drinks.There are 7 draught bitters,9 bottled bitters, 9 minerals,27 spirits and 13 wines. They do cooked food,but do not have accomodation. They have a skittles team but not a darts team.The skittles team won a cup for the highest away score.They have other entertainments including{Jazz {Nights}which are held on Tuesdays.
Steven Brown,Adrian Chick, Philip McCullough.
